lexUnit.name: shave.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cut the hair off (a person or part of the body) with a razor.

sentence.text: He shaved his face clean and combed his thick unruly hair , then continued to dress , hurriedly now , for she was touching on memories that were precious to him .
` I shave my head once a week "
I made Jack shave his head -- because he had the remnants of his hair hanging on -- wonderful shape of ahead -- shaved that off .
After I graduated from high school in 1984 I shaved my head and kept my hair short and they labelled me a skinhead .
Mothers shaved the heads of their daughters and then made them undress to take cold baths in public on the Hill of Calvary .
` They shave their heads .
So Chogyam-Jones and Fruitbat came , arriving an hour early , when Eva was still shaving her legs in the bath in the kitchen .
Sometimes I shave my legs , amazed at the majestic tedium of the activity .
She shaved her legs and underarms , and shampooed her hair .
It was just like , you know , I 'm really grown up now , I 'm shaving my legs .
Here she stopped to watch old Twomey the butler shaving himself with a cut-throat razor .
Mungo noticed that he shaved his black eyebrows .
His wife wash d and shaved him , and ensured that he swallowed the twenty-six pills each day which had been mainly prescribed for his heart .
Sometimes we shave them , other times we have to sit them in the bath with hot water up to their necks and soak it off . " says Jan .

The Doctor was using a pocket mirror to see what was going on outside without sticking his head out of the window , Howard was over by a small stove cooking several breakfasts , the hospital staff were milling about seeing to their patients , and Petion was being shaved by an orderly using a piece of broken glass .
His fingers and nails were scraped to remove the sacred unction ; a barber shaved what remained of his tonsure , and he was clad in a poor yeoman beadle 's gown .
` When I am shaving in the morning I say to myself that if I were a young man I would emigrate .
Many , indeed most of the photographs will be new to most of the readers , not least the picture , ( for example ) , of Emilio Sanchez shaving in a Paris bathroom !
Sarah prefers shaving in the shower .
I shaved in cold water and walked out of the gate and across the parade ground to where a queue of people were waiting to be served at the kitchen .
His hair was combed and carefully parted , he had shaved with a new blade .
John Major shaved carefully for the second time that day .
In a particularly bold move , I decided to shave less often .
